data.name: AbsorptionChoiceProperty.TransactionName
data.comment: The format string to use when the assimilation absorption choice property is modified. Shown in the undo dropdown in VS.

data.name: AbsorptionChoiceProperty.Description
data.value: Absorption choices for one-to-one FactTypes and Subtype relationships.
data.comment: The description for the AbsorptionChoice property. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: AbsorptionChoiceProperty.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the AbsorptionChoice property on a FactType. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: AssimilationAbsorptionChoice.Absorb
data.comment: The displayed form of the Absorb enum value

data.name: AssimilationAbsorptionChoice.Partition
data.comment: The displayed form of the Partition enum value

data.name: AssimilationAbsorptionChoice.Separate
data.comment: The displayed form of the Separate enum value

data.name: AssimilationMapping.InvalidPatternForPartitionException
data.value: Partitioning is not allowed with the current subtyping pattern. Partitioning requires an ExclusiveOr constraint between all subtypes.
data.comment: The exception message used when an attempt is made to partition a pattern that does not support partitioning.

data.name: AssimilationMapping.InvalidSeparationPatternForAbsorbException
data.value: Absorption is not possible without additional modifications on direct or indirect supertype relationships.
data.comment: The exception message used when an attempt is made to absorb an assimilation in an incorrect pattern.

data.name: AssimilationMapping.InvalidPartitionPatternForAbsorbException
data.value: A partitioned ObjectType cannot be absorbed into another ObjectType.
data.comment: The exception message used when an attempt is made to absorb a partitioned object type.

data.name: NameGeneration.ValueTypeValueColumn
data.comment: The name of the identifier column for a ValueType mapped to its own top-level table.

data.name: MappingCustomizationProperty.Category
data.comment: The category for relational mapping customizations. Displays as a grouping category in the Properties Window.

data.name: ObjectTypeAbsorptionChoiceProperty.Description
data.value: Absorption state for an ObjectType involved in Subtyping and some other one-to-one FactType relationships. The choice to absorb is ignored if absorbing removes all evidence of the absorbed ObjectType.
data.comment: The description for the AbsorptionChoice property on an ObjectType. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: ObjectTypeAbsorptionChoiceProperty.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the AbsorptionChoice property on an ObjectType. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ObjectTypeAbsorptionChoice.Absorbed
data.comment: The ObjectType is absorbed through all paths.

data.name: ObjectTypeAbsorptionChoice.CustomAbsorbed
data.comment: The ObjectType is absorbed, but not through all paths.

data.name: ObjectTypeAbsorptionChoice.NotApplicable
data.comment: The ObjectType has supertypes, does not need be separated.

data.name: ObjectTypeAbsorptionChoice.Partitioned
data.comment: The ObjectType is partitioned.

data.name: ObjectTypeAbsorptionChoice.PartitionedChild
data.comment: The ObjectType is the subtype of a partitioned parent.

data.name: ObjectTypeAbsorptionChoice.Separate
data.comment: The ObjectType is fully separated on all paths.

data.name: ObjectTypeAbsorptionChoice.UnpartitionAbsorb
data.comment: Remove the current partition, absorbing subtypes when then are not partitioned.

data.name: ObjectTypeAbsorptionChoice.UnpartitionSeparate
data.comment: Remove the current partition, separating all subtypes.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.CurrentModelDefaultFormatString.CustomFormat
data.comment: The displayed form of the ModelDefault value in the dropdown list when the ModelDefault is CustomFormat

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.CurrentModelDefaultFormatString.EntityTypeName
data.comment: The displayed form of the ModelDefault value in the dropdown list when the ModelDefault is EntityTypeName

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.CurrentModelDefaultFormatString.ReferenceModeName
data.comment: The displayed form of the ModelDefault value in the dropdown list when the ModelDefault is ReferenceModeName

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.CurrentModelDefaultFormatString.ValueTypeName
data.comment: The displayed form of the ModelDefault value in the dropdown list when the ModelDefault is ValueTypeName

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.CurrentFormatString.CustomFormat
data.comment: The format string for the dropdown form of the current naming choice when CustomFormat is current. {0} is replaced with the customized name for the current selection.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.CurrentFormatString.EntityTypeName
data.comment: The format string for the dropdown form of the current naming choice when EntityTypeName is current. {0} is replaced with the name of the EntityType for the current selection.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.CurrentFormatString.ReferenceModeName
data.comment: The format string for the dropdown form of the current naming choice when ReferenceModeName is current. {0} is replaced with the name of the ReferenceMode for the current selection.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.CurrentFormatString.ValueTypeName
data.comment: The format string for the dropdown form of the current naming choice when ValueTypeName is current. {0} is replaced with the name of the ValueType for the current selection.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultCustomFormat.InvalidDefaultCustomFormatException
data.value: At least one recognized replacement field must be specified for a default custom format.
data.comment: The text for the exception thrown when an attempt is made to enter a default custom format with no replacement fields.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultCustomFormat.General
data.comment: Custom formatting for a general reference mode defaults to {EntityType}{ReferenceMode}.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultCustomFormat.Popular
data.comment: Custom formatting for a popular reference mode defaults to {EntityType}{ReferenceMode}.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultCustomFormat.UnitBased
data.comment: Custom formatting for a unit-based reference mode defaults to {ReferenceMode}{EntityType}.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultGroup.DisplayValue.Custom
data.comment: Value displayed for any modified state of the grouped reference mode customization options.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultGroup.DisplayValue.Default
data.comment: Value displayed for the default state of the grouped reference mode customization options.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultGroup.General.Description
data.value: Model default settings controlling how general reference modes are used for generated names. Default settings can be modified for any EntityType that uses a standard reference scheme to provide its preferred identifier.
data.comment: The description for the GeneralReferenceModeNames property on an ORMModel. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultGroup.General.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the GeneralReferenceModeNames property on an ORMModel. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultGroup.Popular.Description
data.value: Model default settings controlling how popular reference modes are used for generated names. Default settings can be modified for any EntityType that uses a standard reference scheme to provide its preferred identifier.
data.comment: The description for the PopularReferenceModeNames property on an ORMModel. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultGroup.Popular.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the PopularReferenceModeNames property on an ORMModel. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultGroup.UnitBased.Description
data.value: Model default settings controlling how unit-based reference modes are used for generated names. Default settings can be modified for any EntityType that uses a standard reference scheme to provide its preferred identifier.
data.comment: The description for the UnitBasedReferenceModeNames property on an ORMModel. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultGroup.UnitBased.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the UnitBasedReferenceModeNames property on an ORMModel. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultPrimaryIdentifierCustomFormat.General
data.comment: Custom formatting for a general reference mode used as a primary identifier defaults to {EntityType}{ReferenceMode}.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultPrimaryIdentifierCustomFormat.Popular
data.comment: Custom formatting for a popular reference mode used as a primary identifier defaults to {EntityType}{ReferenceMode}.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultPrimaryIdentifierCustomFormat.UnitBased
data.comment: Custom formatting for a unit-based reference mode used as a primary identifier defaults to {ReferenceMode}{EntityType}.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DisplayedReplacementField.EntityTypeName
data.comment: The replacement field displayed to the user for the EntityTypeName in the CustomFormat editor.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DisplayedReplacementField.ReferenceModeName
data.comment: The replacement field displayed to the user for the ReferenceModeName in the CustomFormat editor.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DisplayedReplacementField.ValueTypeName
data.comment: The replacement field displayed to the user for the ValueTypeName in the CustomFormat editor.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DisplayedReplacementFieldShortForm.EntityTypeName
data.comment: The short form of the parseable replacement field for an EntityTypeName in the CustomFormat editor.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DisplayedReplacementFieldShortForm.ReferenceModeName
data.comment: The short form of the parseable replacement field for a ReferenceModeName in the CustomFormat editor.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DisplayedReplacementFieldShortForm.ValueTypeName
data.comment: The short form of the parseable replacement field for a ValueTypeName in the CustomFormat editor.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.CustomFormatProperty.Description
data.value: Set the custom format for references to this EntityType. Use the {ValueType} {EntityType} and {ReferenceMode} replacement fields mixed with any other text. The short forms (V}{E}{R} can also be used to enter replacement fields.
data.comment: The description for the ReferencedEntityTypeCustomFormat property on an ObjectType. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.CustomFormatProperty.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the ReferencedEntityTypeCustomFormat property on an ObjectType. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.CustomFormatProperty.DisplayName.ExtensionSpecific
data.comment: The display name for the ReferencedEntityTypeCustomFormat property on an ObjectType when there are multiple reference mode naming implementations. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.CustomFormatProperty.TransactionName
data.comment: The format string to use when the ReferencedEntityTypeCustomFormat property is modified. Shown in the undo dropdown in VS.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.NamingChoiceProperty.Description
data.value: Specifies how the EntityType, ValueType, and ReferenceMode names are used to generate names for references to this EntityType.
data.comment: The description for the ReferencedEntityTypeName property on an ObjectType. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.NamingChoiceProperty.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the ReferencedEntityTypeName property on an ObjectType. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.NamingChoiceProperty.DisplayName.ExtensionSpecific
data.comment: The display name for the ReferencedEntityTypeName property on an ObjectType when there are multiple reference mode naming implementations. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.NamingChoiceProperty.TransactionName
data.comment: The format string to use when the ReferencedEntityTypeName property is modified. Shown in the undo dropdown in VS.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultCustomFormatProperty.Description
data.value: The model default for how EntityType, ReferenceMode, and ValueType names are combined when custom format name generation is used for references to an EntityType with this reference mode kind. Use the {ValueType} {EntityType} and {ReferenceMode} replacement fields mixed with any other text. The short forms (V}{E}{R} can also be used to enter replacement fields.
data.comment: The description for the ReferencedEntityTypeCustomFormat property on ReferenceModeType-scoped naming options on an ORMModel. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultCustomFormatProperty.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the ReferencedEntityTypeCustomFormat property on ReferenceModeType-scoped naming options on an ORMModel. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultCustomFormatProperty.TransactionName
data.comment: The format string to use when the ReferencedEntityTypeCustomFormat property is modified. Shown in the undo dropdown in VS.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultNamingChoiceProperty.Description
data.value: The model default for how EntityType, ReferenceMode, and ValueType names are used to generate named references to an EntityType with this reference mode kind.
data.comment: The description for the ReferencedEntityTypeName property on ReferenceModeType-scoped naming options on an ORMModel. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultNamingChoiceProperty.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the ReferencedEntityTypeName property on ReferenceModeType-scoped naming options on an ORMModel. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultNamingChoiceProperty.TransactionName
data.comment: The format string to use when the ReferencedEntityTypeName property is modified. Shown in the undo dropdown in VS.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultPrimaryIdentifierCustomFormatProperty.Description
data.value: The model default for how EntityType, ReferenceMode, and ValueType names are combined when custom format name generation is used for simple primary identification column for an EntityType with this reference mode kind. Use the {ValueType} {EntityType} and {ReferenceMode} replacement fields mixed with any other text. The short forms (V}{E}{R} can also be used to enter replacement fields.
data.comment: The description for the PrimaryIdentifierCustomFormat property on ReferenceModeType-scoped naming options on an ORMModel. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultPrimaryIdentifierCustomFormatProperty.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the PrimaryIdentifierCustomFormat property on ReferenceModeType-scoped naming options on an ORMModel. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultPrimaryIdentifierCustomFormatProperty.TransactionName
data.comment: The format string to use when the PrimaryIdentifierCustomFormat property is modified. Shown in the undo dropdown in VS.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultPrimaryIdentifierNamingChoiceProperty.Description
data.value: The model default for how EntityType, ReferenceMode, and ValueType names are used to generate the simple primary identification column for an EntityType with this reference mode kind.
data.comment: The description for the PrimaryIdentifierName property on ReferenceModeType-scoped naming options on an ORMModel. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultPrimaryIdentifierNamingChoiceProperty.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the PrimaryIdentifierName property on ReferenceModeType-scoped naming options on an ORMModel. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.DefaultPrimaryIdentifierNamingChoiceProperty.TransactionName
data.comment: The format string to use when the PrimaryIdentifierName property is modified. Shown in the undo dropdown in VS.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.PrimaryIdentifierCustomFormatProperty.Description
data.value: Set the custom format for a simple identifier column generated for this EntityType. Use the {ValueType} {EntityType} and {ReferenceMode} replacement fields mixed with any other text. The short forms (V}{E}{R} can also be used to enter replacement fields.
data.comment: The description for the PrimaryIdentifierCustomFormat property on an ObjectType. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.PrimaryIdentifierCustomFormatProperty.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the PrimaryIdentifierCustomFormat property on an ObjectType. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.PrimaryIdentifierCustomFormatProperty.DisplayName.ExtensionSpecific
data.comment: The display name for the PrimaryIdentifierCustomFormat property on an ObjectType when there are multiple reference mode naming implementations. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.PrimaryIdentifierCustomFormatProperty.TransactionName
data.comment: The format string to use when the PrimaryIdentifierCustomFormat property is modified. Shown in the undo dropdown in VS.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.PrimaryIdentifierNamingChoiceProperty.Description
data.value: Specifies how the EntityType, ValueType, and ReferenceMode names are used to generate a simple identifier column name for this EntityType.
data.comment: The description for the PrimaryIdentifierName property on an ObjectType. Displays as a detailed description in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.PrimaryIdentifierNamingChoiceProperty.DisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the PrimaryIdentifierName property on an ObjectType. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.PrimaryIdentifierNamingChoiceProperty.DisplayName.ExtensionSpecific
data.comment: The display name for the PrimaryIdentifierName property on an ObjectType when there are multiple reference mode naming implementations. Displays as the name of a property in the Properties Window.

data.name: ReferenceModeNaming.PrimaryIdentifierNamingChoiceProperty.TransactionName
data.comment: The format string to use when the PrimaryIdentifierName property is modified. Shown in the undo dropdown in VS.

data.name: ReferenceModeNamingProperty.Category
data.comment: The category for reference mode naming customizations. Displays as a grouping category in the Properties Window.
